subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: Kerry Collins threw for a touchdown, Chris Johnson and LenDale White ran for a score apiece, and the Titans routed the Steelers in a showdown of the A.F.C.’s best teams.
snippet: Kerry Collins threw for a touchdown, Chris Johnson and LenDale White ran for a score apiece, and the Titans routed the Steelers in a showdown of the A.F.C.’s best teams.
